channel.title: Voting? Bit confused 718

item.title: Voting? Bit confused 718
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Incompatible data types…

Launcher.vote.hasVoted

What does that return?

Because that seems to return a different type of VoteReward (you may have tried a different system or something and forgot to remove it)

The VoteReward you’re trying to use is imported from com.rs.database.vote;
But the VoteReward it wants is imported from org.Vote.VoteReward;

Which is why I think you just forgot to update something :3

Read full topic

item.title: Voting? Bit confused 718
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

When I compile this it comes up with

Regular

import com.rs.database.vote.RewardClaim;
import com.rs.database.vote.VoteChecker;
import com.rs.database.vote.VoteReward;

	if (cmd[0].equals("claim")) {
                try {
                    VoteReward reward = Launcher.vote.hasVoted(player.getUsername().toLowerCase().replaceAll(" ", "_"));
                    if(reward != null){
                        switch(reward.getReward()){
                            case 0:
							player.getInventory().addItem(995, 10000000);
                                //vote id 0
                                break;
                            case 1:
                                //vote id 1
                                break;
                            //add more here
                            default:
                                player.getPackets().sendMessage(99, "Reward not found.", player);
                                break;
                        }
                        player.getPackets().sendMessage(99, "Thank you for voting.", player);
                    } else {
                        player.getPackets().sendMessage(99, "You have no items waiting for you.", player);
                    }
                } catch (Exception e){
                    player.getPackets().sendMessage(99, "[GTL Vote] An SQL error has occured.", player);
                }
                    return true;
			}

VoteReward

package com.rs.database.vote;

public class VoteReward
{
  private String playerName;
  private int rewardId;

  public VoteReward(String p, int r) {
    this.playerName = p;
    this.rewardId = r;
    System.out.println(p + " has voted and been rewarded with reward id: " + r + ".");
  }

  public String getPlayerName() {
    return this.playerName;
  }

  public int getReward() {
    return this.rewardId;
  }
}

Read full topic
